metadata.title: CVE-2021-39371 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-preview 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: An XML external entity (XXE) injection in PyWPS before 4.4.5 allows anattacker to view files on the application server filesystem by assigning apath to the entity. OWSLib 0.24.1 may also be affected.

criterions.comment: pywps package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
